name: CALM .4oz
description: Overwhelmed much? CALM those nerves with a blend of intentional, artisan organic herbs. SMOKE, SIP & SOAK for lingering relaxation & just let it go… ________________________________________ Achieve CALM by either: 16 Herbal Rolls or 32 mixed Herbal & Tobacco/Cannabis Rolls 4-8 Therapeutic Teas or 1-2 Restorative Baths ________________________________________ CALM CONTAINS: Turnera Diffusa Long hailed as an aphrodisiac, has also been promoted as a euphoria-inducing substance by the native peoples of Mexico. Nepeta Cataria* Artifacts from Europe to China suggest it's medicinal use as a sedative for over 2,000 years. Scutellaria Laterifolia* Relieves states of nervous tension while renewing and invigorating the central nervous system. Lavandula Officinalis Effective in clearing depression and stress related headaches. Also known as a natural sleep inducer. Verbascum Thapsus An age-old healing agent used by Native Greeks and Native Americans, amongst others. It's effect is calming and can be used as a sleep aid. *Not for pregnant or lactating women. Intended for recreational use. Contains no hazardous chemical or pharmaceutical additives. Consult your physician in the case of medical concerns. None of our products contain Tobacco or Cannabis.

name: FOCUS .4oz
description: So many ideas! Where to start?! F O C U S with our intentional blend comprised of hand-picked, USDA Certified Organic herbs. ________________________________________ Get back in FOCUS by either SMOKING, SIPPING & SOAKING: 16 Herbal Rolls or 32 mixed Herbal & Tobacco/Cannabis Rolls 4-8 Therapeutic Teas or 1-2 Restorative Baths ________________________________________ CONTAINS: Ilex Paraguariensis Native to subtropical South America, known to enhance memory, increases energy and stimulate heart health. Contains caffeine. Ginkgo Biloba Oldest living tree species known. Increases circulation to the brain improving concentration and lowering memory deficits. **Lmtd edition Fall Gold Ginkgo while supplies last. Eschscholzia Californica* Native to U.S. & Mexico, counteracts depression, long-term mental & physical tiredness and treatment of behavioral disorders such as ADD & ADHD. Mentha Spicata* Is an effective reliever of ailments such as minor headaches, nervous strain, fatigue and stress. Verbascum Thapsus An age old herbal remedy for respiratory problems, and long recognized as beneficial preventative treatment for asthma and related conditions. *Not for pregnant or lactating women. Intended for recreational use. Contains no hazardous chemical or pharmaceutical additives. Consult your physician in the case of medical concerns. None of our products contain Tobacco or Cannabis.
